entries.name: new(ary, sec=nil)
entries.desc: Creates a TupleEntry based on ary with an optional renewer or expiry time sec.

entries.name: alive?()
entries.desc: A TupleEntry is dead when it is canceled or expired.

entries.name: make_expires(sec=nil)
entries.desc: Returns an expiry Time based on sec which can be one of:

entries.name: renew(sec_or_renewer)
entries.desc: Reset the expiry time according to sec_or_renewer.

entries.name: value()
entries.desc: Return the object which makes up the tuple itself: the Array or Hash.
